meanings.definition: A person who adheres to or advocates brutalism in architecture.
meanings.sent1: The brutalists in our city love the strong, concrete buildings.
meanings.sent2: The brutalists gathered to discuss their favorite architectural styles.
meanings.sent3: The brutalists joked that their dream house would be a giant concrete block.
meanings.sent4: In a world of glass and steel, the brutalists stand out like monuments of strength.
meanings.sent5: The brutalists' passion for brutalism is as solid as the buildings they admire.

meanings.definition: A group of architects who design buildings in the brutalist style.
meanings.sent1: The city hired brutalists to create a new, imposing structure.
meanings.sent2: The brutalists' latest project showcases their signature concrete designs.
meanings.sent3: The brutalists playfully argued over who could make the most intimidating building.
meanings.sent4: Their work as brutalists transforms cities into landscapes of raw power.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the city, you can't miss the impact of the brutalists' creations.
